list.text:
Christmas Cookie Cutter Wreath
Have extra cookie cutters to spare? Repurpose those tools into a wreath with the perfect amount of Christmas charm.

Rustic Wreath
Made of moss- and lichen-covered twigs, the wreath sets an unfussy tone for visitors.

All-Weather Wreath
Why stop at the door? Upgrade a halo of Scotch pine and fir with LED lights and ornaments.

DIY Galvanized Wreath
Add some metallic charm to your holiday decor with this galvanized wreath.

DIY Felt Ball Wreath
Colorful felt balls combing to make the cutest wreath, perfect for a playroom.

Chalkboard Wall Message Board + Wreath
Tie a festive eucalyptus wreath with a red ribbon over a chalkboard message board for a multipurpose holiday display.

Christmas "Joy" Wreath
Use stained wood, white lettering, and red garnishes to craft this "joyful" wreath.

Cork Wreath
Wine lovers will get a kick out of this idea: Upcycle old corks into a small wreath to hang on your liquor cabinet.

Retro Yarn Wreath
Filled with '70s flair, this retro wreath will evoke memories of past Christmases.

Wreath Made of Edible Herbs
For food fans: Combine sage, oregano, rosemary, and bay leaves to create a culinary wreath inspired by savory holiday dishes.
